segments.source_content:
---
title: 'React Native 0.76 - New Architecture by default, React Native DevTools, and more'
authors: [blakef, cipolleschi, frankcalise, gabrieldonadel]
tags: [announcement, release]
date: 2024-10-23T16:00
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: Today we are excited to release React Native 0.76!

translations.zh-hant: 今天我們興奮地宣布 React Native 0.76 正式發布！

segments.source_content: This is a major milestone for React Native, as we’re enabling the New Architecture by default, and we’re introducing React Native DevTools. This has been the culmination of 6 years of hard work from our team, together with the support of our incredible community of developers.

translations.zh-hant: 這是 React Native 的重要里程碑——我們將預設啟用新架構，並推出 React Native DevTools。這凝聚了團隊六年來的努力，以及廣大開發者社群的支持。

segments.source_content: ### Highlights

translations.zh-hant: ### 重點更新

segments.source_content:

- [Faster Metro resolution](#faster-metro-resolution)
- [Box Shadow and Filter style props](/blog/2024/10/23/release-0.76-new-architecture#box-shadow-and-filter-style-props)

translations.zh-hant:
- [預設啟用 React Native 新架構](/blog/2024/10/23/release-0.76-new-architecture#react-native-new-architecture-by-default)
- [React Native DevTools](/blog/2024/10/23/release-0.76-new-architecture#react-native-devtools)
- [更快的 Metro 解析速度](#faster-metro-resolution)
- [Box Shadow 與 Filter 樣式屬性](/blog/2024/10/23/release-0.76-new-architecture#box-shadow-and-filter-style-props)

segments.source_content: ### Breaking Changes

translations.zh-hant: ### 重大變更

segments.source_content:
- [Removed the dependency on the react-native-community/cli](/blog/2024/10/23/release-0.76-new-architecture#removed-the-dependency-on-the-react-native-communitycli)

segments.source_content: <!--truncate-->

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c0bf612b

segments.source_content: ## Highlights

translations.zh-hant: ## 重點功能詳述

segments.source_content: ### React Native New Architecture by default

translations.zh-hant: ### 預設啟用 React Native 新架構

segments.source_content: Starting from React Native 0.76, the New Architecture is enabled by default in your projects. The New Architecture is a rewrite of the internals of React Native to enable app developers to develop high quality native applications using React.

translations.zh-hant: 從 React Native 0.76 開始，新專案將預設啟用新架構。這項架構重寫了 React Native 的內部實現，讓開發者能透過 React 打造高品質的原生應用。

segments.source_content: Today, we’re excited to declare the New Architecture ready for production use.

translations.zh-hant: 我們正式宣布新架構已達生產環境適用標準。

segments.source_content: This change is a milestone in the evolution of React Native, and we invite you to read the dedicated blogpost to understand what's included in the New Architecture and how it will shape the future of React Native: [The New Architecture is Here](/blog/2024/10/23/the-new-architecture-is-here).

translations.zh-hant: 此變革標誌著 React Native 的進化關鍵，歡迎閱讀專文了解新架構內容與未來發展：[新架構正式登場](/blog/2024/10/23/the-new-architecture-is-here)。

segments.source_content: ### React Native DevTools

translations.zh-hant: ### React Native DevTools

segments.source_content: ![React Native DevTools front-end](/blog/assets/0.76-react-native-devtools.jpg)

translations.zh-hant: ![React Native DevTools 前端介面](/blog/assets/0.76-react-native-devtools.jpg)

segments.source_content: We're releasing the first stable version of React Native DevTools, our new default debugging experience.

translations.zh-hant: 我們推出首個穩定版的 React Native DevTools，作為預設除錯解決方案。

segments.source_content: We want the tooling you use to debug React across all platforms to be reliable, familiar, simple, and cohesive. React Native DevTools delivers on these principles — browser-aligned developer tools that are deeply integrated with React Native. Key features include:

translations.zh-hant: 我們致力讓跨平台 React 除錯工具符合可靠、直覺、簡潔且一致的標準。React Native DevTools 實現這些原則——深度整合且與瀏覽器工具協調的開發者工具，主要功能包含：

segments.source_content:
- **Familiar, web-aligned tooling** — A fully featured debugger based on Chrome DevTools with reliable breakpoints, watch values, step-through debugging, stack inspection, and a rich JavaScript console. These core features now work reliably and across reloads.
- **Improved and integrated React DevTools** — The built-in React Components Inspector and Profiler work seamlessly, with faster and more reliable component highlighting.
- **Improved UX** — See a new _Paused in Debugger_ overlay, making it clear when your app is paused on a breakpoint. Warnings in LogBox are now displayed as a summary, and hidden when DevTools is attached.
- **Fixed reconnection behaviour** — JavaScript breakpoints now work reliably across reloads and when DevTools is disconnected and reattached. DevTools can even reconnect to the same app after a native rebuild.
- **Instant launch** — React Native DevTools is ready by default with zero config. Open it from the in-app Dev Menu or via <kbd>j</kbd> to debug in the CLI server, which now supports multiple emulators and devices.

translations.zh-hant:
- **Familiar, web-aligned tooling** — A fully featured debugger based on Chrome DevTools with reliable breakpoints, watch values, step-through debugging, stack inspection, and a rich JavaScript console. These core features now work reliably and across reloads.
- **Improved and integrated React DevTools** — The built-in React Components Inspector and Profiler work seamlessly, with faster and more reliable component highlighting.
- **Improved UX** — See a new _Paused in Debugger_ overlay, making it clear when your app is paused on a breakpoint. Warnings in LogBox are now displayed as a summary, and hidden when DevTools is attached.
- **Fixed reconnection behaviour** — JavaScript breakpoints now work reliably across reloads and when DevTools is disconnected and reattached. DevTools can even reconnect to the same app after a native rebuild.
- **Instant launch** — React Native DevTools is ready by default with zero config. Open it from the in-app Dev Menu or via <kbd>j</kbd> to debug in the CLI server, which now supports multiple emulators and devices.

segments.source_content: React Native DevTools is fundamentally different from our previous debugging options, including being different from the Experimental Debugger experience first shipped in 0.73. It switches to a new backend debugging stack that we’ve rebuilt over the last year. This means that compatibility with previous tooling [has changed](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/819#:~:text=announcement%20talk%20%F0%9F%8E%AC.-,Compatibility,-React%20Native%20DevTools), and you should also expect a much more reliable experience end-to-end. We intend to build upon this new stack to allow us to reliably implement more features in future, such as the Performance and Network panels.

translations.zh-hant: React Native DevTools 與我們先前的除錯選項有根本上的不同，包括與 0.73 版本首次推出的實驗性除錯器體驗也有所差異。它切換到我們過去一年重建的全新後端除錯堆疊。這意味著與舊版工具的[相容性已改變](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/819#:~:text=announcement%20talk%20%F0%9F%8E%AC.-,Compatibility,-React%20Native%20DevTools)，且您應能預期端到端的體驗會更加可靠。我們計劃基於此新堆疊，未來可靠地實現更多功能，例如效能與網路面板。

segments.source_content: #### Phasing out logs in Metro

translations.zh-hant: #### 逐步淘汰 Metro 中的日誌

segments.source_content: In our next release, we're removing forwarded logs in Metro to align with modern browser tooling, and remove old debugging integrations. Instead, use React Native DevTools' fully featured Console panel for logging. See more under our [FAQs](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/819#:~:text=point%20is%20deprecated.-,FAQs,-React%20Native%20DevTools).

translations.zh-hant: 在下一個版本中，我們將移除 Metro 中轉發的日誌，以與現代瀏覽器工具保持一致，並淘汰舊的除錯整合。請改用 React Native DevTools 功能完整的控制台面板進行日誌記錄。詳見我們的[常見問答](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/819#:~:text=point%20is%20deprecated.-,FAQs,-React%20Native%20DevTools)。

segments.source_content: **Links**

translations.zh-hant: **相關連結**

segments.source_content:

- [Announcement talk at React Universe Conf](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OwivVpg6Luc)
- [Feedback thread and FAQs](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/819)

translations.zh-hant:
- [更新後的除錯文件](/docs/debugging)
- [React Universe Conf 上的發布演講](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OwivVpg6Luc)
- [意見回饋討論串與常見問答](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/819)

segments.source_content: ### Faster Metro resolution

translations.zh-hant: ### 更快的 Metro 解析

segments.source_content: We've shipped several performance improvements to Metro's resolver, the component responsible for finding a module from an import path, making it around [15x faster](https://x.com/MetroBundler/status/1831709057670861260). This improves the overall performance of Metro, particularly for warm builds, which we've seen at around 4x faster.

translations.zh-hant: 我們對 Metro 的解析器（負責從導入路徑查找模組的組件）進行了多項效能改進，使其速度提升約[15倍](https://x.com/MetroBundler/status/1831709057670861260)。這提升了 Metro 的整體效能，特別是熱建置（warm builds）的速度，我們觀察到約有4倍的提升。

segments.source_content: ### Box Shadow and Filter style props

translations.zh-hant: ### Box Shadow 與 Filter 樣式屬性

segments.source_content:
We’ve added two New Architecture only style props in 0.76 - `boxShadow` and `filter`. Both of these props exist on the web, and the team stick to the specs when possible so that these props are predictable, familiar, and ultimately easier to adopt (see the limitations and spec deviations sections for the exceptions).
As a result, you can look up the web documentation to fully understand how these work, but there are a few important differences which are noted below.

translations.zh-hant:
我們在 0.76 版本中新增了兩個僅限新架構的樣式屬性——`boxShadow` 和 `filter`。這兩個屬性在網頁開發中已存在，團隊盡可能遵循規範，使這些屬性具有可預測性、熟悉度，最終更容易採用（例外情況請參閱限制與規範偏差部分）。
因此，您可以查閱網頁文件以全面了解其運作方式，但以下會說明幾個重要的差異點。

segments.source_content: #### `boxShadow`

translations.zh-hant: #### `boxShadow`

segments.source_content: `boxShadow` adds a shadow to an element, with the ability to control the position, color, size, and blurriness of the shadow. Check out the [MDN documentation](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/box-shadow) for a full overview of each of these arguments, along with a fiddle to try them out for yourself. Below are a few examples of the shadows you can make.

translations.zh-hant: `boxShadow` 為元素添加陰影，並可控制陰影的位置、顏色、大小和模糊程度。查閱 [MDN 文件](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/box-shadow)以獲取這些參數的完整概述，並透過互動範例親自嘗試。下方是一些可實現的陰影範例。

segments.source_content: ![New boxShadow style prop](/blog/assets/0.76-boxshadow-example.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![新增的 boxShadow 樣式屬性](/blog/assets/0.76-boxshadow-example.png)

segments.source_content: `boxShadow` can take either a string, which mimics the CSS syntax, or JS objects which can embed variables. For example the string `‘5 5 5 0 rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)’` and the object `{offsetX: 5, offsetY: 5, blurRadius: 5, spreadDistance: 0, color: ‘rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)’}` would yield the same box shadow.

translations.zh-hant: `boxShadow` 可接受字串（模擬 CSS 語法）或可嵌入變數的 JS 物件。例如，字串 `‘5 5 5 0 rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)’` 與物件 `{offsetX: 5, offsetY: 5, blurRadius: 5, spreadDistance: 0, color: ‘rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)’}` 會產生相同的盒狀陰影。

segments.source_content: The [previous shadow functionality](https://reactnative.dev/docs/shadow-props) had some shortcomings addressed now addressed by `boxShadow`:

translations.zh-hant: The [previous shadow functionality](https://reactnative.dev/docs/shadow-props) had some shortcomings addressed now addressed by `boxShadow`:

segments.source_content:
- Does not work on Android
- Cannot be [inset](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/box-shadow#inset)
- Does not have [spread](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/box-shadow#length)
- Does not work on `View`s if there is no background color
- Is a separate prop, so it cannot share the same web syntax

translations.zh-hant:
- 在 Android 上無法運作
- 無法設定為[內陰影](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/box-shadow#inset)
- 不支援[擴散距離](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/box-shadow#length)
- 若 `View` 沒有背景色則無法運作
- 是獨立屬性，因此無法共用相同的網頁語法

segments.source_content: #### Limitations & Spec Deviations

translations.zh-hant: #### 限制與規範偏差

segments.source_content: <!--alex ignore black -->

- The default shadow color is black, not the parent’s color
- Android normal shadows are supported on **Android 9+**
- Android inset shadows are supported on **Android 10+**

translations.zh-hant:
- 預設陰影顏色為黑色，而非父元素的顏色
- Android 普通陰影僅支援 **Android 9+**
- Android 內嵌陰影僅支援 **Android 10+**

segments.source_content: #### `filter`

translations.zh-hant: #### `filter`

segments.source_content: `filter` adds certain graphical filters to an element. There are a mix of color filters that let you modify things like brightness, saturation, and hue as well as non-color filters that let you add blurs and shadows. Check out the [MDN documentation](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/filter) for a full overview of each individual filter function, along with a fiddle to try them out for yourself. Below is a hot dog image with various filters applied to it.

translations.zh-hant: `filter` 可為元素添加圖形濾鏡效果。包含可調整亮度、飽和度與色相的色彩濾鏡，以及能添加模糊與陰影的非色彩濾鏡。詳見 [MDN 文件](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/filter)了解各濾鏡函數的完整說明，並透過互動工具實際操作。下圖為熱狗圖片套用不同濾鏡的效果。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_341c2c0e

segments.source_content:
Like `boxShadow`, `filter` can take either a string, which mimics the CSS syntax, or an array of JS objects which can embed variables. For example the string `‘saturate(0.5) grayscale(0.25)’` and the array `[{saturate: 0.5}, {grayscale: 0.25}]` would yield the same filter.
`filter` has a `dropShadow` value which varies slightly from `boxShadow`. The biggest difference is that `dropShadow` is an alpha mask - so the shadow will only be cast by a pixel if it has a nonzero alpha component. `boxShadow`, on the other hand, will cast around the border box of the element, even if nothing is inside of it. Additionally, dropShadow does not have a spread distance parameter and cannot be inset (shadow cast inside of the element).

translations.zh-hant:
Like `boxShadow`, `filter` can take either a string, which mimics the CSS syntax, or an array of JS objects which can embed variables. For example the string `‘saturate(0.5) grayscale(0.25)’` and the array `[{saturate: 0.5}, {grayscale: 0.25}]` would yield the same filter.
`filter` has a `dropShadow` value which varies slightly from `boxShadow`. The biggest difference is that `dropShadow` is an alpha mask - so the shadow will only be cast by a pixel if it has a nonzero alpha component. `boxShadow`, on the other hand, will cast around the border box of the element, even if nothing is inside of it. Additionally, dropShadow does not have a spread distance parameter and cannot be inset (shadow cast inside of the element).

segments.source_content: #### Limitations and Spec Deviations

translations.zh-hant: #### 限制與規格差異

segments.source_content:
- iOS `filter` only supports brightness and opacity
- iOS `filter` will not apply to shadows, outlines, or any other graphical elements outside the bounds of the element
- Android `blur` and `drop-shadow` are only supported on **Android 12+**
- `filter` implies `overflow: hidden`, so children of an element with a `filter` will be clipped if they are positioned outside of the parents bounds.

translations.zh-hant:
- iOS `filter` only supports brightness and opacity
- iOS `filter` will not apply to shadows, outlines, or any other graphical elements outside the bounds of the element
- Android `blur` and `drop-shadow` are only supported on **Android 12+**
- `filter` implies `overflow: hidden`, so children of an element with a `filter` will be clipped if they are positioned outside of the parents bounds.

segments.source_content: ## Breaking Changes

translations.zh-hant: ## 重大變更

segments.source_content: ### Removed the dependency on the @react-native-community/cli

translations.zh-hant: ### 移除對 @react-native-community/cli 的依賴

segments.source_content: As previosly shared in 0.75, our vision is for React Native to be [framework agnostic](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/blob/main/proposals/0759-react-native-frameworks.md). Therefore, we completed the work to remove @react-native-community/cli as a direct dependency of React Native.

translations.zh-hant: 如 0.75 版本所述，我們的目標是讓 React Native 成為[框架無關](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/blob/main/proposals/0759-react-native-frameworks.md)的專案。因此我們已完成移除 React Native 對 @react-native-community/cli 的直接依賴。

segments.source_content: Decoupling React Native from the CLI allows us to move faster through releasing these projects independently and to better separate the responsibilities of both projects.

translations.zh-hant: 將 React Native 與 CLI 解耦，能讓兩個專案更獨立地發布更新，並更明確區分職責範圍。

segments.source_content: If you are relying on the CLI in your daily workflow, make sure to explicitly [add the dependency](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/?from=0.75.4&to=0.76.0#RnDiffApp-package.json) on the CLI in your `package.json`:

translations.zh-hant: If you are relying on the CLI in your daily workflow, make sure to explicitly [add the dependency](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/?from=0.75.4&to=0.76.0#RnDiffApp-package.json) on the CLI in your `package.json`:
@@untranslatable_placeholder_2f34b0ad

segments.source_content: ### Android Apps are ~3.8Mb smaller thanks to Native Library merging

translations.zh-hant: ### 合併原生函式庫使 Android 應用縮小約 3.8MB

segments.source_content: React Native 0.76 will ship with a reduced number of native libraries, as we merged a lot of our native code into a single library called `libreactnative.so`.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 0.76 將減少原生函式庫數量，我們將大量原生程式碼合併為單一函式庫 `libreactnative.so`。

segments.source_content: This change comes with reduction in app size, and improvement in app startup performance on Android. From our benchmarks, we found out that App size will be reduced by ~3.8MB (20% of the total) and median App startup time will be reduced by ~15ms (~8%) ([source](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/816)).

translations.zh-hant: 此變更可縮減應用體積，並提升 Android 應用啟動效能。基準測試顯示應用體積減少約 3.8MB（總體積 20%），應用啟動時間中位數縮短約 15ms（約 8%）（[來源](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/816)）。

segments.source_content: On the other hand, this is a breaking change for both app and library developers.

translations.zh-hant: 但這對應用與函式庫開發者均屬重大變更。

segments.source_content: App developers will have to update their Application’s `onCreate` as follows:

translations.zh-hant: 應用開發者需按以下方式更新 Application 的 `onCreate` 方法：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_eb25bb8c

segments.source_content: This change is necessary in order to properly load libreactnative.so and is [included in the upgrade-helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/).

translations.zh-hant: 此變更為正確載入 libreactnative.so 的必要調整，[已包含在升級輔助工具中](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/)。

segments.source_content: Library authors won’t be affected by this change, unless you have custom C++ code.

translations.zh-hant: 函式庫作者不會受到此變更影響，除非您有自訂的 C++ 程式碼。

segments.source_content: For a technical deep dive into this change, and suggestions for library authors, you can read more about it [in the dedicated post](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/816).

translations.zh-hant: 如需此變更的技術深入探討以及對函式庫作者的建議，您可以[在專文](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/816)中閱讀更多內容。

segments.source_content: ### Updates to Minimum iOS and Android SDK requirements

translations.zh-hant: ### 最低 iOS 與 Android SDK 需求更新

segments.source_content: We have updated our minimum platform and SDK versions:

translations.zh-hant: 我們已更新最低平台與 SDK 版本：

segments.source_content:
- iOS - from 13.4 to [15.1](https://support.apple.com/en-gb/108051#151)
- Android - from SDK 23 to [SDK 24](https://developer.android.com/tools/releases/platforms#7.0) (Android 7)

translations.zh-hant:
- iOS - 從 13.4 更新至 [15.1](https://support.apple.com/en-gb/108051#151)
- Android - 從 SDK 23 更新至 [SDK 24](https://developer.android.com/tools/releases/platforms#7.0) (Android 7)

segments.source_content: This change was announced earlier in the year when 0.75 [was released](/blog/2024/08/12/release-0.75#last-version-supporting-minsdk-23-and-miniosversion-134). For more background, please see the dedicated posts for [Android](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/802) and [iOS](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/812).

translations.zh-hant: 此變更已在今年稍早 0.75 [版本發佈時](/blog/2024/08/12/release-0.75#last-version-supporting-minsdk-23-and-miniosversion-134)預告。更多背景資訊請參閱 [Android](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/802) 與 [iOS](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/discussions/812) 的專文說明。

segments.source_content: ### Other Breaking Changes

translations.zh-hant: ### 其他重大變更

segments.source_content:
- **Animation**
  - Stop sending state updates to React in looping animation. This was causing unnecessary re-rendering with looping animations.
- **devtools:**
  - Remove Inspector Panel perf + network tabs under New Arch. ([RFC](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/blob/main/proposals/0777-remove-legacy-element-inspector-features.md))
- **text engine**
  - Always use AttributedStringBox instead of AttributedString in TextLayoutManager

translations.zh-hant:
- **動畫**
  - 停止在循環動畫中向 React 發送狀態更新。這曾導致循環動畫產生不必要的重新渲染。
- **開發工具:**
  - 在新架構下移除 Inspector 面板的效能與網路分頁。([RFC](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/blob/main/proposals/0777-remove-legacy-element-inspector-features.md))
- **文字引擎**
  - 在 TextLayoutManager 中一律使用 AttributedStringBox 而非 AttributedString

segments.source_content: #### Android

translations.zh-hant: #### Android

segments.source_content:
- **rendering:**
  - View backgrounds are no longer directly `ReactViewBackgroundDrawable` or `CSSBackgroundDrawable`

translations.zh-hant:
- **渲染:**
  - 視圖背景不再直接使用 `ReactViewBackgroundDrawable` 或 `CSSBackgroundDrawable`

segments.source_content: #### iOS

translations.zh-hant: #### iOS

segments.source_content:
- **turbomodule**
  - Removed the `RCT_EXPORT_CXX_MODULE_EXPERIMENTAL` Macro for autolinking pure Cxx module.

translations.zh-hant:
- **turbomodule**
  - 移除用於自動連結純 Cxx 模組的 `RCT_EXPORT_CXX_MODULE_EXPERIMENTAL` 巨集

segments.source_content: ## Acknowledgements

translations.zh-hant: ## 致謝

segments.source_content: React Native 0.76 contains over [1070 commits](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/compare/v0.75.4...v0.76.0) from 156 contributors. Thanks for all of your hard work!

translations.zh-hant: React Native 0.76 包含來自 156 位貢獻者的超過 [1070 次提交](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/compare/v0.75.4...v0.76.0)。感謝所有人的辛勤付出！

segments.source_content: Thanks to all the additional authors that worked on documenting features in this release post:

translations.zh-hant: 特別感謝以下作者為本版本發佈文檔撰寫功能說明：

segments.source_content:
- [Joe Vilches](https://github.com/joevilches) and [Nick Gerleman](https://github.com/NickGerleman) box-shadow and filter style props.
- [Alex Hunt](https://github.com/huntie) React Native DevTools.
- [Nicola Corti](https://github.com/cortinico) Android shipping as a single library.

translations.zh-hant:
- [Joe Vilches](https://github.com/joevilches) 與 [Nick Gerleman](https://github.com/NickGerleman) 的 box-shadow 和 filter 樣式屬性。
- [Alex Hunt](https://github.com/huntie) 的 React Native 開發工具。
- [Nicola Corti](https://github.com/cortinico) 的 Android 單一函式庫打包。

segments.source_content: ## Upgrade to 0.76

Please use the [React Native Upgrade Helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/) to view code changes between React Native versions for existing projects, in addition to the Upgrading docs.

translations.zh-hant: 請使用 [React Native 升級助手](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/)查看現有專案在 React Native 版本間的程式碼變更，並參閱升級文件。

segments.source_content: If you use Expo, React Native 0.76 will be supported in Expo SDK 52.

translations.zh-hant: 若您使用 Expo，React Native 0.76 將在 Expo SDK 52 中獲得支援。

segments.source_content: If you need to create a new project using the CLI, you can run this command:

translations.zh-hant: 如需使用 CLI 建立新專案，可執行以下指令：

segments.source_content:
```
npx @react-native-community/cli@latest init MyProject --version latest
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_ff27b4c2

segments.source_content:
:::info
0.76 is now the latest stable version of React Native and 0.73.x moves to unsupported. For more information see [React Native's support policy](https://github.com/reactwg/react-native-releases/blob/main/docs/support.md). We aim to publish a final end-of-life update of 0.73 in the near future.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::info
0.76 版現為 React Native 的最新穩定版本，0.73.x 將轉為不受支援狀態。更多資訊請參閱 [React Native 支援政策](https://github.com/reactwg/react-native-releases/blob/main/docs/support.md)。我們預計在近期發佈 0.73 的最終終止支援更新。
:::
